info.title: Val Town API
info.description:
Val Town’s public API

OpenAPI JSON endpoint:

https://api.val.town/openapi.json

bearerAuth.description: Endpoints that support authorization expect Bearer authentication, using an API token provided from Val Town.

anyOf.description: The user’s biography, if they have provided one
The user’s handle that they chose for themselves. Does not include the @ symbol
URL that points to the user’s profile image, if one exists

url.description: URL of this user’s profile on Val Town’s website

self.description: URL of this user on this API

ResultSet.title: ResultSet
ResultSet.description: Result of executing an SQL statement.

columns.description:
Names of columns.

Names of columns can be defined using the `AS` keyword in SQL:

```sql
SELECT author AS author, COUNT(*) AS count FROM books GROUP BY author
```

columnTypes.description:
Types of columns.

The types are currently shown for types declared in a SQL table. For column types of function calls, for example, an empty string is returned.

items.description: Columns can be accessed like an object by column names.

rowsAffected.description:
Number of rows that were affected by an UPDATE, INSERT or DELETE operation.

This value is not specified for other SQL statements.

lastInsertRowid.description:
ROWID of the last inserted row.

This value is not specified if the SQL statement was not an INSERT or if the table was not a ROWID table.

version.description: The version of this val, starting at zero

anyOf.description: TypeScript code associated with this val

public.description: Whether this val is available publicly on Val Town

privacy.description: This resource's privacy setting. Unlisted resources do not appear on profile pages or elsewhere, but you can link to them.

type.description: The type of a val. HTTP can receive web requests, Email can receive emails, Cron runs periodically, and Script can be used for libraries or one-off calculations

url.description: The URL of this resource on the Val Town website

self.description: The URL of this val on this API

versions.description: The endpoint to retrieve this val's versions

module.description: The URL of this Val's source code as a module

endpoint.description: This val's web endpoint, where it serves a website or API

anyOf.description: The user who created this val

likeCount.description: How many likes this val has received

referenceCount.descriptions: How many other public vals have imported this one

tags.name: vals
tags.description:
These endpoints
let you get, create, and run vals.

tags.name: alias
tags.description:
Many API endpoints
accept IDs instead of user-facing names. The alias
endpoints let you convert between the user-facing name of a
val or another object into an ID that can be used with other
API endpoints

tags.name: me
tags.description:
These endpoints
give access to details and data from the requesting user.
